languages.text: "Пускай нападают. Проверим, чьи головы крепче сидят на плечах. Да, Глейто?"
languages.translation_comment:
Killed the Bloodstained Proselytes in the arena.
Marazhai: "The Cult will not forgive us for gutting their best fighters. I think we are already being tracked by a few individuals whose speciality is hunting champions — our heads will fetch a very high price."

traits.locale_text: "Пускай нападают. Проверим, чьи головы крепче сидят на плечах. Да, Глейто?"

languages.text: "Let them attack. We'll see whose heads are more securely attached. Right, Glaito?"
languages.translation_comment:
Killed the Bloodstained Proselytes in the arena.
Marazhai: "The Cult will not forgive us for gutting their best fighters. I think we are already being tracked by a few individuals whose speciality is hunting champions — our heads will fetch a very high price."
languages.original_text: "Пускай нападают. Проверим, чьи головы крепче сидят на плечах. Да, Глейто?"

traits.locale_text: "Let them attack. We'll see whose heads are more securely attached. Right, Glaito?"

"Let them attack. We'll see whose heads are more securely attached. Right, Glaito?"

languages.text: 「攻撃させてやれ。どっちの首がしっかり胴についてるか、見てやろうじゃないか。なあ、グライト」
languages.original_text: "Let them attack. We'll see whose heads are more securely attached. Right, Glaito?"

traits.locale_text: 「攻撃させてやれ。どっちの首がしっかり胴についてるか、見てやろうじゃないか。なあ、グライト」

languages.text: "Lasst sie angreifen. Wir werden sehen, wessen Köpfe besser befestigt sind. Oder, Glaito?"
languages.original_text: "Let them attack. We'll see whose heads are more securely attached. Right, Glaito?"

traits.locale_text: "Lasst sie angreifen. Wir werden sehen, wessen Köpfe besser befestigt sind. Oder, Glaito?"

languages.text: « Qu'ils nous attaquent donc. Nous verrons bien quelles têtes tomberont. N'est-ce pas, Glaito ? »
languages.original_text: "Let them attack. We'll see whose heads are more securely attached. Right, Glaito?"

traits.locale_text: « Qu'ils nous attaquent donc. Nous verrons bien quelles têtes tomberont. N'est-ce pas, Glaito ? »

languages.text: «Que vengan. Ya veremos quién conserva las cabezas sobre los hombros. ¿Verdad, Glaito?».
languages.original_text: "Let them attack. We'll see whose heads are more securely attached. Right, Glaito?"

traits.locale_text: «Que vengan. Ya veremos quién conserva las cabezas sobre los hombros. ¿Verdad, Glaito?».

languages.text: “那就让他们放马过来吧，我倒是想看看谁的脑袋更牢靠。你说呢，格雷托？”
languages.original_text: "Let them attack. We'll see whose heads are more securely attached. Right, Glaito?"

traits.locale_text: “那就让他们放马过来吧，我倒是想看看谁的脑袋更牢靠。你说呢，格雷托？”

languages.text: "Bırak gelsinler. Bakalım kimin kellesi ne kadar ediyormuş, öyle değil mi Glaito?"
languages.original_text: "Let them attack. We'll see whose heads are more securely attached. Right, Glaito?"

traits.locale_text: "Bırak gelsinler. Bakalım kimin kellesi ne kadar ediyormuş, he Glaito?"

languages.original_text: "Let them attack. We'll see whose heads are more securely attached. Right, Glaito?"
